Verses: 1 dhevane, Umadhu Kirubaiyinpadi Enakku Irangum, Umadhu Migundha Irakkangalinpadi En Meerudhalgal Neenga Ennaich Suththigariyum.
2 en Akkiramam Neenga Ennai Mutrilum Kazhuvi, En Paavamara Ennaich Suththigariyum.
3 en Meerudhalgalai Naan Arindhirukkiren; En Paavam Eppozhudhum Enakku Munbaaga Nirkiradhu.

4 dhevareer Oruvarukke Virodhamaaga Naan Paavanjeydhu, Umadhu Kangalukku Munbaagap Pollaangaanadhai Nadappiththen; Neer Pesumbodhu Ummudaiya Needhi Vilangavum, Neer Niyaayandheerkkumbodhu Ummudaiya Parisuththam Vilangavum Idhai Arikkaiyidugiren.
5 idho, Naan Thurkkunaththil Uruvaanen; En Thaai Ennaip Paavaththil Karppandhariththaal.
6 idho, Ullaththil Unmaiyirukka Virumbugireer; Andhakgaranaththil Gnaanaththai Enakkuth Theriyappaduththuveer.
7 neer Ennai Eesoppinaal Suththigariyum, Appozhudhu Naan Suththamaaven; Ennaik Kazhuviyarulum, Appozhudhu Naan Uraindha Mazhaiyilum Venmaiyaaven.
8 naan Sandhoshamum Magizhchchiyum Ketkumpadi Seyyum, Appozhudhu Neer Norukkina Elumbugal Kalikoorum.
9 en Paavangalaip Paaraadhapadikku Neer Umadhu Mugaththai Maraiththu, En Akkiramangalaiyellaam Neekkiyarulum.
10 dhevane, Suththa Irudhayaththai Ennile Sirushtiyum, Nilaivaramaana Aaviyai En Ullaththile Pudhuppiyum.
11 umadhu Samugaththai Vittu Ennaith Thallaamalum, Umadhu Parisuththa Aaviyai Ennidaththilirundhu Eduththukkollaamalum Irum.
12 umadhu Iratchaniyaththin Sandhoshaththaith Thirumpavum Enakkuth Thandhu, Ursaakamaana Aavi Ennaith Thaangumpati Seyyum.
13 appozhudhu Paadhagarukku Umadhu Vazhigalai Ubadhesippen; Paavigal Ummidaththil Mananthirumbuvaargal.
14 dhevane, Ennai Ratchikkun Dhevane, Raththappazhigalukku Ennai Neengalaakkividum; Appozhudhu En Naavu Ummudaiya Needhiyaik Gembeeramaaip Paadum.
15 aandavare, En Udhadugalaith Thirandharulum; Appozhudhu En Vaai Ummudaiya Pugazhai Arivikkum.
16 baliyai Neer Virumbugiradhillai, Virumbinaal Seluththuven; Thaganabaliyum Umakkup Piriyamaanadhalla.
17 dhevanukkerkum Baligal Norungunda Aavidhaan; Dhevane, Norungundadhum Narungundadhumaana Irudhayaththai Neer Purakkaniyeer.
18 seeyonukku Umadhu Piriyaththinpadi Nanmaiseyyum; Erusalemin Madhilgalaik Kattuveeraaga.
19 appozhudhu Thaganabaliyum Sarvaanga Thaganabaliyumaagiya Needhiyinbaligalil Piriyappaduveer; Appozhudhu Umadhu Beedaththinmel Kaalaigalaip Baliyiduvaargal.
